title: Seirei Gensouki (Spirit Chronicles)
synopsis: When 20-year-old college student Haruto Amakawa dies in a traffic accident, he does not expect to wake up in an unfamiliar world in the body of a young boy named Rio. As their memories and personas fuse, Rio realizes that he now also possesses magical powers. He is relieved to find that his burning passion for revenge against his mother's murderers has not subsided, despite his newly changed identity.
related_anime: ['Seirei Gensouki 2nd Season', 'Celia-sensei no Wakuwaku Magical Kyoushitsu', 'Seirei Gensouki']
